WorkItem.Description:
There seems to be a problem when RAWR get item data from Wowhead, but from Armory it works just fine. For exampel the folowing items and what stats they get when I update from respectivly stat:
 
helm of lighting halls:
		wowhead	armory
armor	985		985
intelect	60		60
stamina	58		58
mp5		31		31
spellpower0		91
 
titansteel guardian		
stamina	58		58
crit rating	0		29
spellpower0		490
 
I think I pretty much trashed my database by doing "update item cache" so I guess that get's its data from Wowhead?
 
If I reinstall, does it get its data from armory then so that could be a workaround?
 
Best regards, and thanks for a fantastic piece of software!
WorkItem.Summary: Items get wrong stats when updating from Wowhead

Comments.Message: Sorry, forgot: Running version 2.1.3, Healadin module

There are values from the json fields that we aren't handling, for example:
"atkpwr:76"
